articles.title: Russia-Ukraine war latest: Zelenskiy calls on west for planes and tanks; Biden not seeking Russia regime change, says White House - The Guardian
articles.description: Ukrainian president tells Europe its own security is at stake; Secretary of State qualified Biden remarks that Putin ‘cannot remain in power’
articles.content:
It was the kind of spring day in Mayfair they used to write songs about. Beneath a cloudless sky daffodils were blooming in Hyde Park. Blue and yellow, the colours of Ukraine.

articles.title: "I'll Be Blunt...": Ukraine MP After Biden Speech In Neighbouring Poland - NDTV
articles.description: A Member of Parliament in Ukraine has criticised US President Joe Biden for not doing enough to help the east European nation counter the Russian invasion, in its second month now.
articles.content:

articles.author: Maegan Vazquez and Kyle Feldscher, CNN
articles.title: 8 takeaways from Biden's trip to Europe - CNN
articles.description: President Joe Biden used a last-minute trip to Europe this week to rally the world's democracies and announce more actions against Russia for its invasion of Ukraine, while also causing a geopolitical stir with one of the final lines from his speech in Poland.
